summary: Contoso Wireless internet is an ultra-fast and reliable connection that offers download speeds up to 1Gbps and upload speeds up to 500Mbps. Coverage is available in most major cities across the US, as well as some rural areas. The service includes 24/7 customer service and online support, and plans start at $49.99 per month with no additional fees or taxes. Customers need a compatible wireless router to get started, and should read through the Terms & Conditions before signing up for the service. Additionally, there is a 30-day money back guarantee if the customer is not satisfied with the service.
